register.description: The Revision Register contains the major and minor revisions for the module.

bitfield.description: RTL revision. Will vary depending on release.

register.description: The PSI-L proxy timeout register controls the timeout watchdog and reports timeout occurrances on PSI-L configuration transactions issued by the built in PSI-L proxy.

bitfield.description: Timeout occurred. When set indicates that a timeout has occurred on a config access. Once set, this bit is persistent until manually cleared
Timeout period. Specifies how many cycles to wait before closing up a conifiguration read or write transaction and asserting the tout bit

register.description: The Command Register A contains the busy indicator, direction, and thread number for the configuration transaction.

bitfield.description: Indication that a configuration read or write is in progress
Indication that a timeout occurred. This bit should be written to 0 on each new transaction.
Thread ID to which configuration read or write is being sent

register.description: The Command Register B contains the byte enables and word address for the configuration transaction.

bitfield.description: Byte enables to use for configuration read or write
Word (32-bit) address within thread configuration space for transaction

register.description: The Write Data Register contains the data which is to be written during the configuration transaction.

bitfield.description: Configuration data word to be written

register.description: The Read Data Register contains the data which which was read back during the configuration transaction.

bitfield.description: Configuration data word that was read
